transcript.text: Shalom Shalom so I don't know why my
last YouTube showed up upside down it's
very weird never happened before so I
didn't want end up putting cards in the
places where I was allowed to put them I
bought myself some lunch sat down read
the Bible but no interaction whatsoever
I'm not allowed to just go up to the
students inside the building so I'm not
really sure what to do now I mean like I
said the few times I've tried to
approach students here on a one-on-one
basis they don't want to talk to me
which just shows that by and large the
population at PSU is basically rejected
the message of the gospel in the Torah
and Yahshua said to wipe off your feet
dust of your feet when that happens I
guess i'll just show my youtube audience
sort of more of where i preach normally
so this is the as you can see this is
the stage where i normally preach like I
said the reason I'm not preaching today
or this week is because it's finals week
and I don't want to disturb the students
as they're preparing for their exams
which is why I wanted to do 101
witnessing but it looks like that one on
witnessing is basically restricted to
just putting my cards out in those two
places I may I pass out a couple cards
to like two students but I don't think
they wanted the cards
so not sure what to do I think maybe I
need to take my evangelism elsewhere
what I'm thinking is maybe i'm going to
start preaching at pioneer courthouse
square which is a main thoroughfare for
businesses and people to get lunches and
things like that in downtown Portland
it's an outdoor public arena and a lot
of people congregate there especially
around the noon hour now today it's it's
bitterly cold I mean it's 22 degrees
outside and it's very very cold so I'm
going to want it to warm up a little bit
so that i can do long term preaching out
there but i think i might just start
going down out there for the rest of the
week because i just don't think there's
going to be many open doors here i
figured if i sat down and ate lunch with
my hope high profile here people would
come up to me and ask me questions but
well I think what I'll do since I've
already paid for you know parking until
almost three o'clock this afternoon I
think I'll go up one more time into the
Smith Memorial Student Union and I'll
just open my Bible and read in the quiet
area and see if anyone approaches me so
this is daniel john lee with tour
restoration ministries websites www
spirit chillum
